description: Determines your maximum health. Hitpoints XP is gained passively alongside most combat training.

trainingMethods.name: General Combat Training
trainingMethods.notes: Hitpoints XP is gained at a rate of 1.33 XP per damage dealt with melee, ranged, or magic (excluding some specific weapons/spells). The listed XP rate is a rough estimate and depends entirely on your combat skill XP rates.

trainingMethods.name: Sand Crabs / Ammonite Crabs
trainingMethods.location: Hosidius Beach (Sand Crabs), Fossil Island (Ammonite Crabs)
trainingMethods.notes: AFK combat training. HP XP is gained alongside your primary combat skill training.

trainingMethods.name: Nightmare Zone (NMZ)
trainingMethods.notes: AFK combat training against quest bosses. HP XP is gained alongside your primary combat skill training. Can be very high with overloads and Dharok's.

trainingMethods.name: Pest Control
trainingMethods.notes: Minigame where points can be exchanged for XP in combat skills, including Hitpoints.

trainingMethods.name: Soul Wars
trainingMethods.notes: Minigame where zeal can be exchanged for XP in combat skills, including Hitpoints.
